review.reviewBody: better than Bubble World! Their boba is amazing and the rice is not soggy and - I don't know how they pull it off but holy hell they're fast! I've reordered every time I WFH
best BBT in Clayton, not over price! foods are decent and lot of options. my favorite is Boneless Chicken and Pork Belly Ramen
The eggplant & chicken teriyaki, along with the hot & sour soup were delicious. I've never had an issue with my orders.
ordered honey dew milk tea and Lychee tea. tasted great as always!
The pearls must be overcooked or something because every time we order there, the pearls are sticking together and they are smooshy too.
